external_games.name: Sel Mounta: Siege the Demon Castle

name: Sel Mounta: Siege the Demon Castle
storyline: Continuing on from the events in Sel-Quinta, the Six City Quest, the party has been left betrayed, injured in one case and stripped of their gear and levels. However, their quest to prevent Sel-Tor's upcoming world invasion is still on, and so the party must attempt to re-group, re-equip and gain the support of the Dwarves of Sel Mounta. But the island itself is suffering an ongoing war with the Demons of the island and the party is dragged into trying to fix this too even as old and new enemies arise as well.
summary: An RPG in which a party of 6 adventurers continue an ongoing quest to stop an invasion from a mysterious isolationist nation. Features JRPG style gameplay and a focus on story.
